translations.name: Persian Contemporary Translation
translations.description: The Persian Contemporary Translation was published by the International Bible Society, now known as Biblica, in 1995. This translation is a thought for thought translation, also called Dynamic equivalence, translating the meanings of phrases or whole sentences. It is a popular translation in Iran and with Christians in the Iranian expatriate community.
